title: A Long, Hard Year for Republicans Who Voted to Impeach After Jan. 6

sentence: Trump's pick against the personally wealthy Meijer, John Gibbs, was also in bad financial shape.
title: Opinion: Republicans who voted to impeach Trump might be in less peril than people think

sentence: The former president endorsed John Gibbs, a former official in his Department of Housing and Urban Development who has a history of promoting conspiracy theories and has signed a pledge to subpoena and investigate Biden's Covid-19 advisor, Anthony Fauci, if elected.
title: Defiant GOP impeachment voters gear up for Trump-backed primaries

sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer (R-Mich.) faces John Gibbs, a former Trump administration official.
author: Cristina Marcos
title: Veteran lawmaker's exit has House GOP trending toward Trump

sentence: Michigan Rep. Peter Meijer raised $553,000, compared to the $123,000 raised by opponent John Gibbs, a former acting assistant secretary in the Department of Housing and Urban Development in the Trump administration.
author: Herb Jackson
title: Trump targets outraise challengers, unlike some other incumbents

sentence: We turn next to Michigan's 3rd in the Grand Rapids area, where Trump's forces have consolidated behind conservative commentator John Gibbs' bid to deny renomination to freshman Rep. Peter Meijer in August.
title: House Republicans all lead their challengers in recent fundraising
